xgpiops_hw.h File Reference

#include "xil_types.h"
#include "xil_assert.h"
#include "xil_io.h"

Defines

#define XGPIOPS_HW_H
#define XGPIOPS_BYPM_MASK_OFFSET   XGPIOPS_REG_MASK_OFFSET
#define XGpioPs_ReadReg(BaseAddr, RegOffset)   Xil_In32((BaseAddr) + (RegOffset))
#define XGpioPs_WriteReg(BaseAddr, RegOffset, Data)   Xil_Out32((BaseAddr) + (RegOffset), (Data))
Register offsets for the GPIO. Each register is 32 bits.



#define XGPIOPS_DATA_LSW_OFFSET   0x000
#define XGPIOPS_DATA_MSW_OFFSET   0x004
#define XGPIOPS_DATA_OFFSET   0x040
#define XGPIOPS_DATA_RO_OFFSET   0x060
#define XGPIOPS_DIRM_OFFSET   0x204
#define XGPIOPS_OUTEN_OFFSET   0x208
#define XGPIOPS_INTMASK_OFFSET   0x20C
#define XGPIOPS_INTEN_OFFSET   0x210
#define XGPIOPS_INTDIS_OFFSET   0x214
#define XGPIOPS_INTSTS_OFFSET   0x218
#define XGPIOPS_INTTYPE_OFFSET   0x21C
#define XGPIOPS_INTPOL_OFFSET   0x220
#define XGPIOPS_INTANY_OFFSET   0x224
Register offsets for each Bank.



#define XGPIOPS_DATA_MASK_OFFSET   0x8
#define XGPIOPS_DATA_BANK_OFFSET   0x4
#define XGPIOPS_REG_MASK_OFFSET   0x40
Interrupt type reset values for each bank



#define XGPIOPS_INTTYPE_BANK0_RESET   0xFFFFFFFF
#define XGPIOPS_INTTYPE_BANK1_RESET   0x3FFFFFFF
#define XGPIOPS_INTTYPE_BANK2_RESET   0xFFFFFFFF
#define XGPIOPS_INTTYPE_BANK3_RESET   0xFFFFFFFF

Functions

void XGpioPs_ResetHw (u32 BaseAddress)

Detailed Description

This header file contains the identifiers and basic driver functions (or macros) that can be used to access the device. Other driver functions are defined in xgpiops.h.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:
 Ver   Who  Date     Changes
 ----- ---- -------- -------------------------------------------------
 1.00a sv   01/15/10 First Release
 1.02a hk   08/22/13 Added low level reset API function prototype and
                     related constant definitions

#define XGpioPs_ReadReg ( BaseAddr,
RegOffset   )     Xil_In32((BaseAddr) + (RegOffset))

This macro reads the given register.

Parameters:
BaseAddr is the base address of the device.
RegOffset is the register offset to be read.
Returns:
The 32-bit value of the register
Note:
None.
#define XGPIOPS_REG_MASK_OFFSET   0x40
#define XGpioPs_WriteReg ( BaseAddr,
RegOffset,
Data   )     Xil_Out32((BaseAddr) + (RegOffset), (Data))

This macro writes to the given register.

Parameters:
BaseAddr is the base address of the device.
RegOffset is the offset of the register to be written.
Data is the 32-bit value to write to the register.
Returns:
None.
Note:
None.
